NetmapID.Label: Netmap ID
NetmapID.Note: Corresponding metatdata is Domain. A netmap corresponds to a single domain, but a netmap can move between domains when a new leaf domain is created.

ContextUUID.Label: Context UUID
ContextUUID.Note: XXX: ASA Context and FP context will be unified into the same field. If necessary, we can add a contextType field to differentiate them.

Context.Label: Context Name
Context.Note: XXX: ASA Context and FP context will be unified into the same field. If necessary, we can add a contextType field to differentiate them.

SendingCountryID.Label: Sending Country ID of the File download/upload

SendingCountry.Label: Sending Country Name of the File download/upload

SendingContinent.Label: Sending Continent Name of the File download/upload

SendingPort.Label: Sending Port of the File download/upload

OriginalInitiatorCountryCode.Label: Original Source Country ISO3 3166 Alpha-3 code

SendingIP.Label: Sending IP of the File download/upload

ReceivingCountryID.Label: Receiving Country ID of the File download/upload

ReceivingCountry.Label: Receiving Country Name of the File download/upload

ReceivingContinent.Label: Receiving Continent Name of the File download/upload

ReceivingPort.Label: Receiving Port of the File download/upload

ReceivingIP.Label: Receiving IP of the File download/upload

FirewallPolicyUUID.Label: Firewall Policy UUID
FirewallPolicyUUID.Note: This field contains policy uuid for FirewallRuleApplicationHitCounts, but policy revision uuid for all other event types

MonitorRuleID.Label: Monitor Rule ID
MonitorRuleID.Note: XXX: Array of up to 8 elements

MonitorRule.Label: Monitor Rule Name
MonitorRule.Note: XXX: Array of up to 8 elements

NetflowSourceAS.Label: NetFlow Source AS
NetflowSourceAS.Description: NetFlow source BGP autonomous system number

NetflowDestinationAS.Label: NetFlow Destination AS
NetflowDestinationAS.Description: NetFlow destination BGP autonomous system number

UserNameNoRealm.Label: User Name without the Realm name

UserLocationIP.Label: User Location IP
UserLocationIP.Note: From localtionip_v6 field. XXX: Should we add geolocation information for the user location?

SI_CategoryID.Label: Security Intelligence Category
SI_CategoryID.Note: XXX: Array of up to 2 elements

TID_CategoryID.Label: Threat Intelligence Director Category
TID_CategoryID.Note: XXX: Internal use for TID observations

SI_Category.Label: Security Intelligence Category Name
SI_Category.Note: XXX: Array of up to 2 elements

SI_DirectionID.Label: Security Intelligence Source or Destination ID

DNS_RecordTypeID.Label: DNS Record Type ID
DNS_RecordTypeID.Note: XXX: Do we have metadata for this?

DNS_ResponseTypeID.Label: DNS Response Type ID
DNS_ResponseTypeID.Note: XXX: Do we have metadata for this?

IP_ReputationSI_Category.Label: IP Reputation Security Intelligence Category Name

SperoDisposition.DefaultValue: Spero detection not performed on file
SperoDisposition.Label: Spero Disposition

SHA_DispositionID.Label: SHA Disposition ID
SHA_DispositionID.Note: Comes from field disposition for FileEvent and field retro_disposition for FireAMPEvent

OriginalDispositionID.Label: Original Disposition ID
OriginalDispositionID.Note: Comes from field original_disposition for FileEvent and field disposition for FireAMPEvent

SyslogParserTrigger.Label: Dummy field to signal parsing of syslog

EVE_ProcessConfidencePct.Label: EVE Process Confidence
EVE_ProcessConfidencePct.Note: Confidence that Mercury has detected the right process

EVE_ThreatConfidencePct.Label: EVE Threat Confidence
EVE_ThreatConfidencePct.Note: Confidence the process detected is malware in percentage

FileExtractStatsSubrecord.Label: Stats by Disposition or stats by file type

ConnectionCount.Label: Number of total connections/flows in the bucket

PAT_Range_RangeStart.Label: Port Address Translation Range: Range Start

ReportedBy.Label: Login or Logoff is reported by this source

VPN_ClientCountryCode.Label: VPN Client Country ISO3 3166 Alpha-3 code

FileRetrospective.Note: File Retrospective subtype used by Umbrella. It is different from FileRetrospectiveEvent type
